Metadata.title: Marvel Orleans - Student & Aspiring Developer
Metadata.desc: Marvel Orleans is a developer-in-training building digital projects and exploring his passion for the web. Take a look at his work and what he's learning.

about.title: Who Am I?
about.desc: Hey, Marvel Orleans here. ðŸ‘‹ I'm a highshooler in Indonesia with a passion in programming. I've been teaching myself to code for a over two years now, and I've built some side projects to show for it. So, if you've got a project you'd like to work on, feel free to contact me.

nextjsPortfolioSite.title: NextJS Portfolio Site
nextjsPortfolioSite.desc: Responsive and multilingual, built with modern tech. Complete with light and dark themes.

animatedMatrices.title: Animated Matrices
animatedMatrices.desc: A tool to help students learn matrices in linear algebra visually and interactively.

croquisImageReferences.title: Croquis Desktop App
croquisImageReferences.desc: A reference-sketching tool used daily by a professional artist.

nextjsPortfolioSite.title: NextJS Portfolio Site
nextjsPortfolioSite.desc: A polished, evolving portfolio site built from scratchâ€”now with light/dark mode and support for three languages, including both Chinese scripts. Design inspired by Tim Gatzke (tim-gatzke.de), rebuilt and iterated upon.

simplePortfolioSite.title: Simple Portfolio Site
simplePortfolioSite.desc: Designed a personal portfolio site using standard HTML, CSS, and JSâ€”focused on simplicity and learning core web development skills.

animatedMatrices.title: Matrix Visualizer Web-app
animatedMatrices.desc: A self-initiated project to help visualize linear algebra transformations, built to deepen my understanding of matrix math. Open source on GitHub.

croquisImageReferences.title: Croquis Image References Desktop App
croquisImageReferences.desc: Handled all aspects solo in building a reference-sketching tool for a professional artist (my brother). Evolved through regular feedback, for practicality and ease of use.
